items.title: C++ - Engine Development & Performance Optimization
items.description: Development of custom C++ systems for Metin2 private servers, focusing on performance optimization and client stability. Memory leak resolution through advanced debugging and memory footprint analysis. Optimization of game resource management (textures, meshes, audio) with lazy loading and caching strategies. Legacy code refactoring to improve maintainability and reduce client crashes. Implementation of custom memory allocators and profiling tools to identify performance bottlenecks.

items.title: Python - Game Systems Architecture & Automation

Automation of deployment and testing processes through custom scripts. Development of tools for content creation and configuration management. Implementation of modular event systems for seasonal content.

items.title: MySQL/MariaDB - Database Architecture & Scalability
items.description: Scalable database architecture for management of dynamic game configurations via SQL. Implementation of centralized setting systems for gameplay rules, balance parameters and configurable content. Development of stored procedures for hot-reloading configurations without downtime. Query optimization for real-time access to thousands of configurable parameters. Configuration versioning management and automatic rollbacks.

items.title: Lua - Custom Quest System & Game Logic
items.description: Development of advanced quest systems in Lua for creation of custom missions and dynamic events. Implementation of scripts for NPC behavior, interactive dialogues and unique game mechanics. Creation of modular frameworks for rapid content development and complex reward systems.

conclusion.title: Scalable Architectures & Custom Solutions
conclusion.text: The presented projects represent end-to-end solutions developed to optimize performance, user experience and operational management of Metin2. Each implementation was designed with scalability, maintainability and specific community needs in mind. I'm available to discuss how these skills can be applied to your project, with focus on robust architectures and enterprise-grade code quality.

items.title: React - Advanced Component Architecture & State Management
items.description: Design and development of scalable React architectures based on reusable components, with a focus on performance and maintainability. Implementation of advanced patterns for state management (Context API, Redux Toolkit, React Query) and rendering optimization through memoization and code-splitting. Integration with REST and GraphQL APIs for dynamic data management and creation of reactive and accessible enterprise-level interfaces.

items.title: JavaScript - Application Logic & Interactive Systems
items.description: Development of application logic in JavaScript ES6+, focusing on modular and asynchronous architectures based on Promises and async/await. Implementation of architectural patterns like MVC for interactive and dynamic interfaces. Creation of standalone modules for event handling, data validation, optimizing performance, cross-browser compatibility, and WCAG accessibility.

conclusion.title: Scalable Architectures & Custom Solutions
conclusion.text: The presented projects provide an overview of my journey in front-end development, with a focus on interface architecture, performance optimization, and code quality. Each implementation was designed considering scalability, maintainability, and accessibility, ensuring smooth and consistent user experiences across different devices. I have adopted modern development methodologies, established architectural patterns, and engineering best practices to ensure that applications are robust, modular, and easily extensible. This set of experiences reflects my ability to tackle complex challenges in web development, balancing aesthetics, functionality, and technical performance.
